## IamRequestBasedAuthenticator.setScope() method

Setter for the "scope" parameter to use when fetching the bearer token from the IAM token server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setScope(scope: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | string | (optional) a space-separated string that specifies one or more scopes to be associated with IAM token requests |

**Returns:**

void
